issue.title: GPU laser and ogre test failures with ATI

content.raw: Well, my point was try to update first and check if the error is still present in the new version of ogre and the ATI driver, so maybe the problem was solved (in ogre-1.8 or any other software piece) and we can dedicate time to fix the remaining bugs. Not a problem if you want to explore this bug first.
